name: A Means to an End
description:
Created for...

MoonJam 2022 2nd Biannual Theme: A Travesty

...and slightly more polished

***IMPORTANT NOTES***
- Once you click start button, click multiple times during loading to ensure you have the game window focused.

- Don't click the outside the game window or you will lose window focus, and keyboard input will break!

- Controller input doesn't work in this browser port of the game
